case.title: SEEKING A FEMALE FRIEND IN THE EAST VILLAGE FOR GREAT TIMES! - 54 (East Village)
case.text: JUST MOVED INTO THE EAST VILLAGE...SEEKING A FEMALE FRIEND FOR GREAT TIMES..DRINKS DINNER LAUGHS AND POSSIBLY MORE.....SEND A PIC AND LET'S SEE IF THE CHEMISTRY IS RIGHT...L..TAKE A CHANCE.."CARPE DIEM"..CHEERS!
